OrgName: Vertical Screen, Inc. t/a Truescreen, Certiphi Screening and Business Information Group
activities: Vertical Screen, Inc. is the corporate parent of Certiphi Screening, Inc., Truescreen, Inc. and Business Information Group, Inc.; each company is an employment background screening company under the Fair Credit Reporting Act (15 U.S.C. 1681 et seq.).  Our respective clients ("End-Users") provide us with requisite personal information about its applicants and/or employees, as authorized in writing, to enable our processing of employment background screening reports.  We then verify employment, references, education and other credentials directly with the respective sources, which includes (but not limited to) courts, state and federal agencies, police departments, businesses, schools and individuals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU and data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for HR data and American Arbitration Association (AAA) for all other data.
